attributes.action: Improve customer experience on trains by having more partitioning within the carriages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Improve customer experience on trains by having more partitioning within the carriages. These would include food-free sections, child-free sections, family sections, complete silence sections, and combinations thereof.

Vile food smells, disruptive children and noisy people turn a lot of people away from using the rail services.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
